title: Inquiry-Based Learning through Structural Mechanics Simulation in Architecture

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Short-term course for general citizens aiming for practical understanding of architectural structural mechanics. Asynchronous learning activities conducted via LMS platform

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three principles of load distribution in spatial structures using simulation tools.
Learners can analyze forces and deflection phenomena in structural members via simulation and interpret results.
Learners propose two structural design improvement plans applicable to real-world architectural cases through inquiry-based learning activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
